pkgmetadata.longdescription: Hierarchical Model of Species Communities // Hierarchical Modelling of Species Communities (HMSC) is a model-based approach for analyzing community ecological data. This package implements it in the Bayesian framework with Gibbs Markov chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) sampling (Tikhonov et al. (2020) doi:10.1111/2041-210X.13345).
